Text: Energy Farm Project Bloomfield New Mexico Cc Kevin I want to take a few minutes to say that it was a pleasure to meet you last week in Bloomfield and to thank you for taking the time from your busy schedule to attend the meeting I sincerely appreciate your support at the meeting and your comments helped a great deal in clarifying some of the concerns I know you and Rick Moore are working together and trust that you can finalize issues as soon as possible Thank you again for your time and support and I look forward to seeing you again in a better atmosphere Brian OHare Consultant to Ameramex Energy Group Inc
